entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -8.4°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 0.2 km

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:01 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
